answers.answer: Yes right here! I failed my 1 hr 156/140And then had to go back for my 3 hr and my numbers wereFasting 71(after drinking glucola)1 hr 180/1802 hr 108/1553 hr 41/140
What numbers do you have to have to pass the 1 hour test and do you find out if you pass the same day?
Fasting below 951 hr below 1802 hr below 1553 hr below 140

My doctor said you have under 140. I was 161. I had the test Thursday and just got the call today so I thought everything had come back fine. @feg90 that is great to hear. I've been eating so healthy I was surprised when the test came back high
My one hr, I think that my breakfast screw it up
I didn't eat anything for breakfast that day. But I've barely gained any weight and my baby is actually measuring on the small side of normal so I'm hoping that the 3 hour one comes back good.
Is it the same glucose drink for the 3 hour test. That drink was so sugary I'm not looking forward to drinking it again.
Yes, the same, but it has more sugar=100mg
I got a 162 and I get my three hour tomorrow..I hope I pass too..I will let you know

I did mine my 1he test was 175 went back to go the 3hr test my fasting 83    1hr test was 232, 2hr test was200, 3hr test was161 they say I'm diabetic I got to check my sugar 4x's a day if my sugar not down by Monday when I go to the doctor they talking bout insulin or pills God knows I don't like neither and they got me on a special diet
3kidsblessed did you have diabetes in your other pregnancies??

I had to do a 3 hour test to my fasting was 112 they wanted it between 70 and 90My 1 hour was 163 they wanted it between 70 and 179 my 2 hours was 153 they wanted it between 70 and 154 and my 3 hour was 151 and they wanted it between 70 and 139 so  I have to take insulin at night since my fasting was high ..
No this is the first and it's new to me

I just failed my 3 hour! Boo it ***** but whatever will help my baby i will do. Plus I got diagnosed pretty late (32wks) they just kept making me do the 1 hours cause my boy is big and I wasnt positive til now- good luck!
I was wondering if it would be possible to have it in 5th pregnancy and none of the others
This my 6 pregnancy but had 3miscarried 2girl's 7&4 another girl on the way

question: Has anyone received a high reading on their 1 hour test and got a negative on the 3 hour test. I go back for the 3 hour test next week and since I already see a high risk doctor for multiple other reasons I'm hoping there us a chance we won't have to add another thing to the list
